mapper.insert: insert into t_score (storeName, storeDistrict, storeAddress, mobile, contactName, status, userId, createTime) values (#{storeName}, #{storeDistrict}, #{storeAddress}, #{mobile}, #{contactName}, 0, #{userId}, now())
mapper.select: select * from t_score where storeName = #{storeName} and status = 0
select * from t_score where storeName = #{storeName} and storeId != #{storeId} and status = 0
mapper.update: update t_score set storeName = #{storeName}, storeDistrict = #{storeDistrict}, storeAddress = #{storeAddress}, mobile = #{mobile}, contactName = #{contactName}, status = 0, userId = #{userId} where storeId = #{storeId}
